text: Artak Apitonian (, born on August 26, 1971 at Alashkert village, Armavir Province) is an Armenian diplomat, Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of Armenia. == Education == * 1977–1987 - studied and graduated with honors from the Secondary School No 1 of Hoktemberyan։ * 1987–1991 - studied and graduated with honors from the Department of Oriental Studies, Yerevan State University (Arab studies)։ * 1991–1992 - studied and graduated from the Bourguiba Institute of Modern Languages, Tunisia (Arabic) * 1993 - Diplomatic long-term special courses at the Egyptian Foreign Ministry's Diplomatic Studies Institute։ == Professional experience == * 1993–1995 - Attaché, Middle East Department, Israel division, Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Armenia։ * 1995–1997 - Third Secretary, Embassy of Armenia in the Arab Republic of Egypt: * 1997–1998 - Third Secretary, Middle East Department, Israel division։ * 1998 - Counsellor, Permanent Mission of Armenia to the United Nations։ * 1999–2002 - Third Secretary, Chargé d'Affaires of the Embassy of Armenia in Lebanon։ * 2002–2005 - Head of the UN Division, Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Armenia: * 2005–2008 - Counsellor, Deputy Permanent Representative of Armenia to the United Nations, Geneva: * 2008–2009 - Head of the Analytical Department, Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Armenia։ * 2009–2013 - Head of the External Relations Department, Office of the President of Armenia: * 2013 - On November 26, by the decree of the President of Armenia, has been relieved of the post of the Head of the Foreign Relations Department of the Office of the President of Armenia:ON THE RELEASE OF ARTAK APITONIAN FROM THE POST OF THE HEAD OF THE FOREIGN RELATIONS DEPARTMENT OF THE OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF ARMENIA * 2013 - On November 26, by the decree of the President of Armenia, has been appointed as the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Armenia to the Kingdom of Sweden:ОN THE APPOINTMENT OF ARTAK ANTONIAN AS THE AMBASSADOR EXTRAORDINARY AND PLENIPOTENTIARY OF THE REPUBLIC OF ARMENIA TO THE KINGDOM OF SWEDEN * 2014 - On November 6, by the decree of the President of Armenia, has been appointed as the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Armenia to the Republic of Finland:ОN THE APPOINTMENT OF ARTAK ANTONIAN AS THE AMBASSADOR EXTRAORDINARY AND PLENIPOTENTIARY OF THE REPUBLIC OF ARMENIA TO THE REPUBLIC OF FINLAND * 2018 On December 28, 2018, by the decision of the Prime Minister of Armenia has been appointed as the Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs: == Diplomatic Rank == * Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary of Armenia (2012):ON THE BESTOWING OF THE DIPLOMATIC RANK OF ENVOY EXTRAORDINARY AND MINISTER PLENIPOTENTIARY * Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Armenia (2016)ON THE BESTOWING OF THE DIPLOMATIC RANKS == Marital status == Married, with three children. == References == Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Armenian diplomats Category:Yerevan State University alumni
title: Artak Apitonian
